column5: Hello everyone,If you're looking for somewhere to go the next few days, why not stop in at the Minneapolis Sport Show and talk to some resort owners? It's never too early to be planning a fishing trip! 'Hope to see you there.Thanks

Hey campchick good idea!! I'm sure lots of outfitters would love to see a new face or two or those that haven't been able to go for a few years... better yet introduce a young one to the outdoors.... there's getting to be fewer and fewer of them!
